EmailTemplate.name: CSA Value Prop 2
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, what could you do with more hours in your workday?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}},
MBO Partners helps independent contractors save their billable time by providing invoicing, payroll and expense processing services. That mean less wasted time, less headaches and more doing what you love.
Check out this story <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/CSA-Story-August_2013.pdf> about a consultant who found more time for friends, family and travel by outsourcing his administrative tasks to MBO Partners.
Have any questions about how MBO helps independent consultants? Just email me to learn how MBO may be able to help your solo business and maximize your billable hours. ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
